IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_process_achievements') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_process_achievements GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_process_achievements @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT achievement_code, mission_code, param_1, param_2, last_update_at FROM dbo.Process_Achievements WHERE character_id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
